page.title: 17Community life
page.content: Television receiption in the area is very poor due to the distorting effects of the surrounding hills, so a community T.V. aerial has been installed on top of a nearby hill with the help of a grant from Mid Wales Development and serves most of the houses of the village itself. Most of the labour for the project was done by the villagers. There is a Friends of Bwlchysarnau School Association which provides support for the school, mainly financial for such things as swimming lessons and educational visits. The Womens has recently undertaken a graveyard survey to record the inscriptions and dates of the gravestones. The graveyard is entered in the Best kept Graveyard competition, with some modest success.
